name: Climbing Dicks Butte
description:
King Richard is on a quest to climb Dicks Butte, a rather modest slope in Mendocino National Park, California.

Move with arrow keys.

Made for the JamJam 1h Jam 2022, in about 1h, in Sappee, Finland. Theme: Slippery Holographic Golden Dicks.

Technology: Construct 3, PiskelApp
